sql_add_user: INSERT IGNORE INTO users (user_id, user_name, server_name) VALUES (?, ?, ?)
sql_upd_user_info: UPDATE users SET coins = ?, exp = ?, lvl = ?, questions = ? WHERE user_id = ?
sql_connect_question: INSERT INTO conn_quest_ans (question_id, answer_id, user_id, type) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
sql_find_question: SELECT questions.text AS question, answers.text AS answer, type, user_id, MATCH (questions.text) AGAINST (? IN BOOLEAN MODE) AS score FROM questions JOIN conn_quest_ans ON questions.question_id = conn_quest_ans.question_id AND (type = 0 OR user_id = ?) JOIN answers USING (answer_id) ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 100
